mapper.select: select previousseq, previoussubject, seq, subject, content, nextseq, nextsubject from ( select lag(seq, 1) over(order by seq desc) as previousseq , lag(subject, 1) over(order by seq desc) as previoussubject , seq, subject, content , readCount, to_char(regDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as regDate , lead(seq, 1) over(order by seq desc) as nextseq , lead(subject, 1) over(order by seq desc) as nextsubject from tblBoard where status = 1 ) V where V.seq = #{seq}
select count(*) from tblBoard where status = 1
select seq, subject from ( select rownum AS rno , seq, subject, from ( select seq, subject from tblBoard where status = 1 order by seq desc ) V ) T where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}
mapper.insert: insert into tblBoard(seq, subject, content, pw) values(boardSeq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{pw})
